## Load packages
```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read data
```{r}
clim <- read.table(here("data", "clim.txt"), header = TRUE)
```

## Source functions
```{r}
source(here("almond_yield_model.R"))
```

## Use function
```{r}
almond_yield_model(clim_data)
```
